Traduct.inconvenientes_token: I have problems with the code
Traduct.ingrese_token: Enter the password for instant access
Traduct.token_enviar_a: I chose where to receive the Authentication Code
Traduct.pago_subtitulo: Choose how you want to pay, you have 2 options:
Traduct.tus_comprobantes_t2: You can see the payment vouchers that you informed us and the payments made from this site
Traduct.monto_mayor_cero: Amount must be greater than zero
Traduct.pregunta_clave: Where do you want to receive the password?
Traduct.seleccione_clave_destino: Check where you want to receive the password
Traduct.acepte_terminos_condiciones: You must accept the terms and conditions
Traduct.recibir_otro_tel: I want to receive it on another phone
Traduct.fecha_error: The date must be before or equal to the current date.
Traduct.error_decimales: you cannot use more than 2 decimals in the paying amount
Traduct.registrar_pago_t1: Then you can enter the details of the payment made
Traduct.registrar_pago_t2: Half payment for which you paid
Traduct.registrar_pago_t3: Check the data entered, if everything is correct click Confirm to finish.
Traduct.registrar_pago_t4: The payment record was generated successfully!
Traduct.tu_perfil_t1: This is the information we have
Traduct.tu_perfil_t2: Your access data to the portal
Traduct.preguntas_frecuentes_t1: We help you solve your queries
Traduct.preguntas_frecuentes_t2: Enter the keyword of what you want to find out
Traduct.preguntas_frecuentes_t3: Example: Promises of payment, Payment plan, Record a payment, Pay ...
Traduct.error_fecha_promesa: Invalid date. It cannot be less than the current date or exceed the current date in ParamDate days
Traduct.error_monto_promesa: Invalid paying amount. It has to be more than <PAGO_MINIMO> and less than the total debt (<PAGO_MAXIMO>)
Traduct.error_monto_pago: Invalid paying amount. It has to be more than <PAGO_MINIMO> and less than the total maximum amount (<PAGO_MAXIMO>)
Traduct.promesa_subtituilo: Choose how you want to generate the payment promise, you have 2 options:
Traduct.monto_titulo: Promise for the total amount of the debt or entering an amount defined by you.
Traduct.producto_titulo: Promise by selection of the products, either the total of each amount or one defined by you
Traduct.promesa_exito_mensaje2: option, you can pay the Promise through online payment, transfer by homebanking or physically and then register the payment.
Traduct.seleccionar_una_cuota: You must select at least one fee
Traduct.404_msg2: Sorry, an error has occured, Requested page not found!
Traduct.msgTelefonoTitulo: Sorry !, we have no record of your mobile phone.
Traduct.msgTelefono: Please contact 0800 333 0000 to solve it and to be able to enter.
Traduct.msgMail: Please contact 0800 333 0000 to solve it and to be able to enter.
Traduct.default_t1: It's nice to see you here! We want to help you alleviate your debts;)
Traduct.seleccion_productos: Select the products you want to include in your new plan
Traduct.sin_productos: You have no products to generate a payment plan
Traduct.plan_subtitulo: Select the plan that best suits your debt restructuring.
Traduct.ver_detalle: See details of the plan and fees
Traduct.mensaje: The distribution of the amount will be made based on the selected products.
Traduct.mensaje_monto: The distribution of the amount is made by products based on the days of arrears, once the amount is covered, it automatically contemplates the following product to cover the amount entered.
Traduct.plan_exito: The payment plan was generated successfully!
Traduct.subtitulo_grilla_pago: Select the products you want to pay, if the amount to be paid is enabled to edit, you can keep the debt or enter a new one.
Traduct.subtitulo_grilla_promesa: Select the products you want to add in the payment promise, choose when you commit to pay it ( period ) and then click generate promise .
Traduct.subtitulo_monto_promesa: Commit to pay the total amount of the debt or enter another amount , choose when you are going to make the payment ( period ) and then click generate promise .
Traduct.subtitulo_monto_pago: Pay the full amount of the debt or enter another amount , and then click I want to pay .
Traduct.titulo_promesa_historica: Check the payment promises you made
Traduct.subtitulo_promesa_historica: You can see the detail if you do not remember what was promised and pay if they are still valid.
